scripts.start: echo 'Starting production server...' && npx prisma generate && echo 'Prisma client ready' && node server.js
scripts.render-build: npm install && npx prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss && npx prisma generate
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Post-install: cleaning and regenerating Prisma client' && rm -rf node_modules/.prisma && npx prisma generate
